instructions.en: At the roundabout make a slight right
instructions.es: En la rotonda siga ligeramente a la derecha
instructions.es-ES: En la rotonda siga ligeramente a la derecha
instructions.fr: Au rond-point, tourner légèrement à droite
instructions.id: Di bundaran, lakukan agak ke kanan
instructions.it: Alla rotonda fai una destra leggermente
instructions.pl: Na rondzie weź łagodnie w prawo
instructions.pt-BR: Na rotatória, vire suave à direita
instructions.ro: La sensul giratoriu virați ușor dreapta
instructions.tr: Göbekli kavşakta hafif sağ yöne dön
instructions.vi: Đi bên phải nghiêng tại bùng binh
